meta.title: South San Antonio Independent School District / HOME

meta.name: description
meta.content: The South San Antonio Independent School District is located in the south and southwest portion of San Antonio, TX, serving nearly 9,000 students through outstanding instructional programs and staff.

h1.data-content: South San Antonio Independent School District

div.h1: South San Antonio Independent School District
div.p: Every Child - College and Career Ready!

p.span: Welcome to South San ISD! We are a family of educators, staff, and community who are committed to our students and families. We offer free PreK, four Middle School Choice Academies with open enrollment available to all Bexar County middle school students, and more than twenty-two Career and Technical Education pathways.
